seo.title: Napoli til Positano: slik gjør du det
seo.description: Raskeste og rimeligste alternativer fra Napoli til Positano med buss + tog eller sommerferje.

linkLabel: Napoli til Positano: slik gjør du det
intro: Naples → Positano: shuttle to Sorrento + SITA bus year‑round; summer ferries when seas are good; transfers for late arrivals.

sections.title: Train + bus (year-round)
body: From NAP arrivals, take Curreri shuttle (or Alibus + Circumvesuviana) to Sorrento, then ride the SITA bus toward Amalfi.
Buy tickets before boarding, check the day’s departure board, and get off at ‘Chiesa Nuova’ for the fewest stairs to Hostel Brikette.

sections.title: Ferry (summer)
body: Alibus → Molo Beverello; take a ferry to Positano and confirm fares with the operator on the day.
Check cancellations and avoid the last boat if you have onward connections.

sections.title: Late arrivals & transfers
body: Arriving after last ferries/buses? Book a private transfer or stay overnight in Naples/Sorrento.
Confirm drop-off near your accommodation and ask about luggage handling.

a: Tobacconists/kiosks near stations. Buy before boarding and validate on the bus.

faqs.q: How many stairs to the hostel?
a: From ‘Chiesa Nuova’ stop, it’s ~80 m with no staircases.
